item.title: Boxes of Orden
item.description: I just finished reading Chainfire, by Terry Goodkind. I had taken a 2 year hiatus from reading the series and finally returned to it. If you’re looking to pick up recreational reading, I highly recommend the series. It starts with “Wizard’s First Rule”. Truly one of the best series of our time.
